title: Mathematical courses - Probabilities, Statistics, Optimization, R
description: Learn about probabilities, statistics, optimization, logic with examples in R. We are also providing courses about Numerical analysis, matrices, and graphs.

courses.name: Optimization
courses.desc: A short introduction to optimization with examples in R.

courses.name: R language
courses.desc: The language used in most of the mathematics courses. You may use python instead.

courses.name: Statistics
courses.desc: Learn about statistics, be it descriptive or inferential statistics, with examples using R language.

courses.name: Numerical analysis
courses.desc: Learn some tips about how you should handle calculations such as Ax=b on a computer.

courses.name: Logic
courses.desc: Learn about first-order logic, proofs, and demonstrations with examples using OCaml language.

courses.name: Probabilities
courses.desc: An introduction to discrete and continuous probabilities.

courses.name: Graph theory
courses.desc: Graph are used to solve problems (find the shortest path, an Eulerian path, etc.) or in graph databases (Facebook, ...).

courses.name: Matrices
courses.desc: You will use matrices a lot (graphs, numerical analysis, statistics, ...) so it would be good to know more about them.
